p.d: Béatrice and Danny conjure up their childhood memories. She sees him as her only hope of pinning down Leblanc. Anju is at a turning point in his life and takes a surprising decision. The wait for the verdict about custody of Dana worries Caroline greatly. Directed by: Louis-Philippe Héneault (season 3, Canada, 2016) Author: Francine Tougas Cast: Sophie Lorain (Béatrice), Gabriel Arcand (Mr P.), Pierre-Luc Brillant (Olivier-Luc), Linda Sorgini (Gin), Gabriel Sabourin (Benoît), Robert Lalonde (Christophe), Marie-France Lambert (Isabelle), Monique Spaziani (Bernadette), Marie Turgeon (Lucie), Virginie Ranger-Beauregard (Véronique), Mikhail Ahooja (Anju), Rosalie Moreau (Océanne), Mathieu Lorain-Dignard (Arnaud), Rachel Graton (Caroline), James Hyndman (François), Stéphan Allard (Jean-Gilbert) Genre: drama
